titles: The liues, apprehensions, arraignments, and executions, of the 19. late pyrates Namely: Capt. Harris. Iennings. Longcastle. Downes. Haulsey. and their companies. As they were seuerally indited on St. Margrets Hill in Southwarke, on the 22. of December last, and executed the Fryday following.
publisher: Printed [by E. Allde] for Iohn Busby the elder,
notes: The pirates' names are bracketed together on the title page.
Printer's name and publication date from STC.
Running title reads: The liues, araignments, &c. of the late pyrates.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Pirates --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
